## :man_technologist: About Me :
<div>

I'm a computing specialist <img src="https://media.giphy.com/media/WUlplcMpOCEmTGBtBW/giphy.gif" width="30">  whose academic path-from **BSc in Computing** to **MSc in Computer Science**-has centred around **practical, research-driven problem solving**. I specialise in crafting **AI-powered systems** that combine **machine learning**, and other technologies to **automate complex workflows**.

While my postgraduate work focused on **HR case automation in government settings**, my broader goal is to develop **adaptable, explainable AI systems** with applications in **any sector**-public or private. I’m now aiming for a **PhD in Artificial Intelligence**, with a strong emphasis on **data science, machine learning**, and the ethical use of AI in real-world systems.

---

## 💻 Languages & Tools

- **Python** - My primary language for AI, ML, NLP, and backend systems  
- **Django** - Full-stack web apps with modular design  
- **JavaScript** - Frontend scripting & UI logic  
- **SQLite, MySQL, PostgreSQL** - Data storage, analytics-ready schemas  
- **HTML/CSS** - Web interfaces & templating  
- **OpenCV, Tesseract and RegEx** - OCR and NLP pipeline development  
- **scikit-learn, XGBoost, RandomForest** – ML experimentation  
- **Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib** - Data science & visualisation  
- **Other languages** - PHP, C++ <!--Java with SpringBoot-->
